Class: TodoView

Views.TodoView(todo)

Handles the rendering and DOM manipulation for a modal element that displays the details for a specific Todo model. Can be generalized for other models that would benefit from being rendered as a single modal. View

Constructor

new TodoView(todo)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
todo Todo Source Todo model object

form :HTMLFormElement

The modal body is composed of a form that's pre-filled with the model data. The controller handles how to update the model using user inputs into its fields.
Type:
  • HTMLFormElement

setClass(className, remove)

Add or Remove an HTML class to the modal.
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
className string The class to be added to the modal's body
remove Boolean false True: Remove class. False: Add class. (Default: False)
